entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , Trois-Rivières
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:26 PM EDT Friday 24 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Clear, -5.6°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Trois-Rivières Airport 02:00 AM EDT Saturday 25 March 2023
Condition: Clear
Temperature: -5.6°C
Pressure: 102.2 kPa
Visibility: 16.1 km
Humidity: 86 %

Wind: 0 km/h

entry.title: Friday night: A few clouds. Low minus 10.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light early this evening. Low minus 10. Wind chill minus 15 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Friday 24 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Increasing cloudiness. High plus 1.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness in the morning. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 near noon. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 14 in the morning. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Friday 24 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Snow at times heavy mixed with rain. Temperature steady near plus 1.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy. Snow mixed with rain early in the evening. Snowfall amount 15 cm. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 40. Temperature steady near plus 1. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Friday 24 March 2023
